name: TimeRunner (itch)
description:
Use space to jump, left control to use power up and escape to quit the game.

Pressing control when the power up charge is at a certain point will reduce the speed of player to half for up to 5 seconds. This is linked to your overall movement speed which will increase when you use the power up.

The power up bar increases by 1 a second or by 20 (out of 50) when you collect a blue clock.

Collecting red clocks will  reduce your overall speed if is above the minimum value.

You can gain 1 score for every tile traveled or gain 20 for every clock collected
